ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Atmospheric temperature obtained by a sodium lidar at Tromsoe, Norway
ResourceHeader.Description: Atmospheric neutral temperature profile at altitudes between 80 and 110 km obtained by a sodium lidar at Tromsoe, Norway. For details of the instruments, please look at Nozawa et al. (2014). The full reference is Nozawa, S., T. D. Kawahara, N. Saito, C. M. Hall, T. T. Tsuda, T. Kawabata, S. Wada, A. Brekke, T. Takahashi, H. Fujiwara, Y. Ogawa, and R. Fujii, Variations of the neutral temperature and sodium density between 80 and 107 km above Tromso during the winter of 2010-2011 by a new solid state sodium LIDAR, J. Geophys. Res., 119, doi:10.1002/2013JA019520, 2014.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The data are available only for scientific research use. The sodium lidar has been operated under collabrations among ISEE, Nagoya University, Shinshu University, RIKEN, EISCAT, and TGO, University of Tromsoe. Please contact the Principal Investigator (Satonori NOZAWA, nozawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) for the details.

AccessURL.Name: Website of the Tromsoe Sodium Lidar, ISEE, Nagoya University
AccessURL.Description: Sodium lidar data obtained at Tromsoe, Norway.
